text: this recipe is like tapas Fitz meets
Buffalo fee Sal in other words you've
got some rare beef and you've got some
horseradish sauce grinding your own
fresh horseradish is no joke you need to
be prepared and wear your handy dandy
horseradish onion glasses this way when
the fumes come up from the bowl and they
hit you in the face your eyes are
protected and now I'm gonna add the
beets beets give it sweetness and they
make it a gorgeous shade of magenta it's
pungent it's sweet it's fantastic on
recipe sandwiches it's amazing with
gefilte fish it's the kind of thing that
once you have it in the fridge you're
just gonna spread it on everything
sinuses are officially cleared and now
I'm just gonna put this in the fridge
and let it know you can serve the
horseradish with the beef all by itself
I like to make it a little bit lighter
so I mix it into a homemade aioli what
it does is it tones down the sharpness
of the horseradish it makes it a little
bit richer my tenderloin has been pre
seasoned with just salt pepper a little
garlic some lemon zest and I'd let it
sit in the fridge overnight you see how
uneven it is this part is much thicker
and this part is thinner so what I want
to do is tie it up so it's an even
thickness and then it will cook at the
same rate it's better to brown your meat
before you start simmering it that way
you're getting that extra layer of
flavor you get the caramelization you
get that rich bond on the bottom of the
pan all of it makes it more complex
the trick to browning the meat is that
once you put it in the pan don't move it
just let it sit once the broth comes to
a simmer that's when you want to add the
beef back in and when I say simmer I
mean it don't let this boil this is not
boiled beef this is simmered beef that's
how you're going to keep it nice and
rare and juicy if your veggies need
extra time to cook after the beef is
done just let them sit on the stove let
them keep going until they're cooked to
taste you're probably not gonna have
leftovers because this dish
so delicious but if you do be happy
there's nothing better the next day then
a rare beef tenderloin sandwich topped
with homemade beet horseradish
